name: Roasted Pepper and Snow Pea Salad
recipeIngredient: 2 red sweet peppers, about 3/4 pound, roasted, skinned, cored and cut into thin strips, about 1 cup
1 small red onion, peeled, halved and cut into thin slices

recipeInstructions.text: Cook snow peas in boiling salted water to cover for 2 minutes. Drain. Run cold water briefly over snow peas and drain again. Put snow peas, pepper strips and onion in a salad bowl.
Put mustard, vinegar and cumin in a small bowl and add salt and pepper. Beat vigorously with a whisk while adding oil. Stir in the parsley and pour dressing over vegetables. Toss and serve.
